name: 'Donor Card' T-shirt
description: Apparently the union are worried that our product endorses dangerous drinking and have BANNED the sale of Purple Blood apparel on their premises. Slightly hypocritical, one might say, coming from a company who sells Snakebite at £1.70 a pint? Because of this, we’re calling on all Portsmouth University students to show their true colours and show up at the union on Wednesday sporting one of our limited edition Donor Card t-shirts. They’re only £8.00 and go towards a great cause: the production of additional t-shirts and designs to infuriate the union.
